title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Science Learning Design Process Through Ethical Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain a science experiment design process utilizing the 5-stage design thinking framework (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can assess societal impacts in scientific problem-solving processes by applying ethical design principles
Learners can collaboratively develop science education content prototypes with peers using online collaboration tools and incorporate feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
